code: @Override MemorySegment createSegment(int size) {     return new HeapMemorySegment(new byte[size]). }
@Override MemorySegment createSegment(int size, Object owner) {     return new HeapMemorySegment(new byte[size], owner). }

@Test public void testHeapSegmentSpecifics() {     final byte[] buffer = new byte[411].     HeapMemorySegment seg = new HeapMemorySegment(buffer).     assertFalse(seg.isFreed()).     assertFalse(seg.isOffHeap()).     assertEquals(buffer.length, seg.size()).     assertTrue(buffer == seg.getArray()).     ByteBuffer buf1 = seg.wrap(1, 2).     ByteBuffer buf2 = seg.wrap(3, 4).     assertTrue(buf1 != buf2).     assertEquals(1, buf1.position()).     assertEquals(3, buf1.limit()).     assertEquals(3, buf2.position()).     assertEquals(7, buf2.limit()). }
